title: Kochi & Iwakuni Cherry Blossom Voyage
subtitle: A 5-day journey through Japan's most stunning sakura landscapes
highlights: Kochi Castle — one of Japan's original 12 castles, surrounded by 400 cherry trees
Iwakuni Kintai Bridge — iconic five-arched wooden bridge framed by sakura
Onboard hanami parties with sake tastings on deck
Traditional kaiseki dining with seasonal spring ingredients
Guided cultural excursions with English-speaking experts
marketingPoints: Limited to 200 guests for an intimate experience
Premium ocean-view cabins with private balconies
Complimentary kimono fitting and photo session
description: Sail through the Seto Inland Sea during peak cherry blossom season. This carefully curated voyage brings you to two of Japan's most beloved sakura viewing destinations — the historic Kochi Castle grounds and the breathtaking Kintai Bridge in Iwakuni. Every detail is designed to immerse you in the beauty and tradition of hanami.

itinerary.title: Departure from Kobe
itinerary.description: Board the ship at Kobe Port. Welcome reception with champagne and cherry blossom-themed cocktails. Evening sail through the Seto Inland Sea.

itinerary.title: At Sea — Cultural Experiences
itinerary.description: Enjoy onboard workshops: ikebana flower arranging, sake tasting seminar, and a Japanese calligraphy class. Afternoon hanami party on the observation deck.

itinerary.title: Kochi — Castle & Gardens
itinerary.description: Full day in Kochi. Visit Kochi Castle surrounded by hundreds of cherry trees in full bloom. Explore the famous Sunday Market and enjoy local cuisine including katsuo no tataki.

itinerary.title: Iwakuni — Kintai Bridge
itinerary.description: Arrive in Iwakuni for the spectacular Kintai Bridge and Kikko Park. Walk beneath tunnels of cherry blossoms. Optional visit to Iwakuni Castle via ropeway for panoramic views.

itinerary.title: Return to Kobe
itinerary.description: Morning at sea with farewell brunch. Arrive at Kobe Port by noon. Complimentary transfer service available.

title: Suruga Bay Weekend Escape
subtitle: A luxurious 3-day retreat with Mt. Fuji and cherry blossoms
highlights: Suruga Bay — panoramic views of Mt. Fuji with sakura-lined shores
Shimizu Port — gateway to Miho no Matsubara pine grove (UNESCO site)
Sunset sakura viewing from the ship's open-air deck
Fresh seafood from Suruga Bay — Japan's deepest bay
Weekend departure — perfect for short getaways
marketingPoints: Perfect weekend getaway — departs Friday, returns Sunday
Iconic Mt. Fuji views from the ship
All meals included with premium sake pairings
description: Escape for a luxurious weekend on Suruga Bay, where the snow-capped peak of Mt. Fuji meets cherry blossom-lined shores. This compact voyage is ideal for travelers seeking an unforgettable short cruise experience, combining natural beauty with refined Japanese hospitality.

itinerary.title: Departure from Yokohama
itinerary.description: Board at Yokohama Osanbashi Pier. Sail into Sagami Bay with welcome dinner featuring seasonal spring cuisine. Stargazing event on the upper deck.

itinerary.title: Suruga Bay & Shimizu
itinerary.description: Wake to views of Mt. Fuji. Anchor in Suruga Bay for morning onboard activities. Afternoon excursion to Shimizu — visit Miho no Matsubara and local sakura spots. Return for sunset viewing party.

itinerary.title: Return to Yokohama
itinerary.description: Leisurely morning at sea with brunch and reflection. Arrive at Yokohama by early afternoon.
